org.junit.runners

类 AllTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.runner.Runner
      • org.junit.internal.runners.JUnit38ClassRunner
        • org.junit.internal.runners.SuiteMethod
          • org.junit.runners.AllTests
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Describable, Filterable, Sortable

    public class AllTests
extends SuiteMethod
    Runner for use with JUnit 3.8.x-style AllTests classes (those that only implement a static suite() method). For example: 
     @RunWith(AllTests.class)
 public class ProductTests {
    public static junit.framework.Test suite() {
       ...
    }
 }

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      AllTests(java.lang.Class<?> klass)
      Only called reflectively.

    • 方法概要

      • 从类继承的方法 org.junit.internal.runners.SuiteMethod

        testFromSuiteMethod

      • 从类继承的方法 org.junit.internal.runners.JUnit38ClassRunner

        createAdaptingListener, filter, getDescription, run, sort

      • 从类继承的方法 org.junit.runner.Runner

        testCount

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • AllTests

        public AllTests(java.lang.Class<?> klass)
         throws java.lang.Throwable

        抛出:
